title: Add provided hashtags to website (visible + SEO metadata)

requirements.text: Add a visible “Hashtags” block on the customer-facing website that displays the following hashtags exactly as provided: #budhladafastfood, #veg momos, #budhladabestmomos, #budhladabestrestaurant, #dilkhush, #devishhyadav. Use English for any surrounding label text (e.g., section title), and render each hashtag as readable text (optionally as pill/chip styling) without altering the hashtag content.

All non-hashtag UI text added for this change is in English.

requirements.text: Update the site HTML metadata to include the provided hashtags for SEO/discoverability by adding appropriate meta tags in frontend/index.html (e.g., meta name="keywords" and/or appending to the existing meta description) while keeping existing branding text intact.
